Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute at Devon/Ridge
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, Ridge, Pratt, Western and Devon due to street blockage near Devon/Ridge.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, Ridge, Pratt, Western and Devon due to street blockage near Devon/Ridge.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Addison/Janssen
ShortDescription: Westbound 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, South Port, Irving Park, Ashland, and Addison, due to street blockage near Addison/Janssen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, South Port, Irving Park, Ashland, and Addison, due to street blockage near Addison/Janssen.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
